string.value: Lara has a new source of trouble recently. Let's visit her and find out what's troubling her.

Now I need to take some action. Let's show them who's boss! For Lara!

I've done a perfect job with what Lara asked, she is now happy again!

Hello there, I have a severe headache these days and you know what's troubling me? The guard dogs of the treasure dungeon! Huskies and Brown Puppies might be a Mapler's best friend, but the guard dogs down there are everyone's enemy! So, are you going to help me? Please?

Alright, soon you will understand why I'm making such a fuss about those fleabags. I still have the bitemarks on my butt! It hurts! Nothing like kneeling down to pick up a nice shiny object and catch a pair for fangs for your trouble! Now I've had enough! I've used all kinds of bait--meat, fish, and even doggie treats but none of them worked! This is a job for someone strong...you!

Heh, I'd heal faster if you defeat #r50#b Skel Guard Dogs#k, #r30#b Mummy Guard Dogs#k, and #r10 #bAngry Guard Dogs#k. They are guarding MV's treasure in the Treasure Dungeon. Get yourself prepared and jump into the portal above. Good luck!
You will be sorry if you hear the reason why I'm only standing here. Talk to me again if you want to help!
You've done a great job for me! Thank you! Thank you! Don't be shy, take your rewards. You've earned them!
Many treasure hunters shall be thankful to you, but come back soon, you never know when the monsters will return.
Not enough, I want you defeat more monsters! I hope you understood me correctly this time.
